assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethical approval was not needed in this study because we only used data from patients obtained in our diagnostic genetics unit. All genetic studies were performed with the informed consent of the patients which also accepted the use of results for research studies. All experiments were performed without employing biological material from the patients.
